product_name: Manduka eQua Plus Yoga Mat Towel
long_description: The Manduka eQua Plus yoga mat towel offers a slip-free surface to practice on while enjoying hot yoga. Spread the plush towel over your yoga mat to add traction; designed for yoga mats up to 71 in. long (yoga mat not included). Tightly woven fabric feels like suede. Towel can also be used to wipe sweat off your brow or keep you warm while you rest. Packs down small and works great as a travel towel.
short_description: The Manduka eQua Plus yoga mat towel offers a slip-free surface to practice on while enjoying hot yoga.
